mistral:7b-instruct: This Bupa PPO plan fits your profile due to its comprehensive coverage for hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care, which aligns with your multiple health conditions including hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, and stroke. The monthly premium of $420 is affordable considering the high coverage amount of $750,000, a deductible of $2000, and a maximum out-of-pocket expense of $6000, offering financial protection for your medical needs within a middle income bracket.
